briefTitle: Tau Screening Study in Subjects With Early Symptomatic AD
officialTitle: A Multicenter Screening Study With Flortaucipir F 18 in Patients With Early Symptomatic AD; #2

primary.description: Flortaucipir PET scans were rated visually by an expert reader as follows: Not consistent with an AD pattern (τAD-), Moderate AD pattern (τAD+), or Advanced AD pattern and likely to progress (τAD++). Eligibility for future studies was determined from the flortaucipir PET scan according to protocol-specified criteria.

Flortaucipir standardized uptake value ratio (SUVr). A value of 1 signifies no flortaucipir activity above background, values greater than 1 signify increasing flortaucipir activity in the brain. Visual read categories as described for previous measure.
